rounds.comments: (Alex: You have to identify the country with which each dish is associated.)

Pho

Adobo & sinigang

rounds.category: IS THERE A DOCTOR IN THE HOUSE?

clues.text: In 1903 the founder of this brand invented the "Foot Eazer"

This nonprofit international relief organization's humanitarian work won it the 1999 Nobel Peace Prize
He got a life sentence for treating John Wilkes Booth in 1865 but was pardoned before the decade ended

2-word Latin phrase meaning located in the original or existing place or position

rounds.text: Dr. Kenneth Cooper added "S" to a medical adjective to coin this word for the kind of exercise he advocated in a 1968 book
